meanings.definition: The quality or state of being purulent.
meanings.sent1: The purulency of the wound indicated an infection.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the purulency of the abscess.
meanings.sent3: The purulency of the situation made everyone cringe.
meanings.sent4: The purulency of the gossip spread quickly through the office.
meanings.sent5: The purulency of the garbage left a foul smell in the room.

meanings.sent1: The purulency in the wound needed to be drained.
meanings.sent2: The nurse cleaned the purulency from the patient's cut.
meanings.sent3: The purulency in the pimple surprised everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: The purulency of the infection oozed out slowly.
meanings.sent5: The purulency of the wound was a sign of healing.
